title: Handle Breaking News During a Broadcast
description: During a pre-game show, major breaking news happens (e.g., a star player is unexpectedly traded). The producer must immediately incorporate it into the show.

tasks.description: Receive the breaking news alert from a credible source.
tasks.expected_outcome: The producer gets confirmation of the trade.

tasks.description: Instruct the on-air talent to announce the breaking news.
tasks.expected_outcome: The hosts announce the trade on air.

tasks.description: Direct the graphics operator to create a 'Breaking News' graphic with the trade details.
tasks.expected_outcome: A graphic with the news is quickly created and displayed on screen.
